sentence.Network_en: A deciduous shrub ( Symphoricarpos occidentalis ) of western North America, having white berries and pinkish, bell - shaped flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 薄叶西方雪果:一种北美西部的落叶灌木 ( 西方毛核木毛核木属 ), 有白色的浆果和略带淡红色 、 钟形的花.

PerfectNetExp.abs: symphonyorchestra 交响乐队, symphoricarpos 雪果属, symphorema 六苞藤属

means.word_mean: 1. deciduous shrubs of North America and Central America and China
